title: Prohibits sex offenders from being entitled to licenses as state certified and licensed real estate appraisers
summary: Prohibits sex offender from being entitled to licenses as state certified and licensed real estate appraisers; requires real estate appraisers convicted of sex offenses to, within five days of the imposition of sentence, transmit a certified copy of the judgment of conviction to the department of state.

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting sex offen-

    1    Section  1.  Section 160-p of the executive law, as amended by chapter

   23  STATE  WHICH  WOULD  CONSTITUTE  A  SEXUALLY VIOLENT OFFENSE, SUCH STATE

    5    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
